com.ethercis.dao.access.interfaces

Interface I_SystemAccess

  • All Superinterfaces:
    I_SimpleCRUD<I_SystemAccess,java.util.UUID>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemAccess

    public interface I_SystemAccess
extends I_SimpleCRUD<I_SystemAccess,java.util.UUID>
    System access layer interface Created by Christian Chevalley on 4/21/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.UUID createOrRetrieveLocalSystem(I_DomainAccess domainAccess)
      Helper to retrieve or storeComposition a local host identifier
      the local settings is a combination of MAC address and hostname:
      for example: 44-87-FC-A9-B4-B2|TEST-PC
      if the system is not yet in the DB it is created, it is retrieved otherwise
      static java.lang.Integer delete(I_DomainAccess domainAccess, java.util.UUID id) 
      java.lang.String getDescription() 
      java.util.UUID getId() 
      static I_SystemAccess getInstance(I_DomainAccess domainAccess, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String settings) 
      java.lang.String getSettings() 
      static I_SystemAccess retrieveInstance(I_DomainAccess domainAccess, java.util.UUID id)
      retrieve a system entry by its Id
      static java.util.UUID retrieveInstanceId(I_DomainAccess domainAccess, java.lang.String settings)
      retrieve the Id of a system by name (or settings)

        static java.util.UUID retrieveInstanceId(I_DomainAccess domainAccess,
                                         java.lang.String settings)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        retrieve the Id of a system by name (or settings)
        Parameters:
        domainAccess - SQL access
        settings - a string describing the system (arbitrary convention)
        Returns:
        UUID or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createOrRetrieveLocalSystem

        static java.util.UUID createOrRetrieveLocalSystem(I_DomainAccess domainAccess)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Helper to retrieve or storeComposition a local host identifier
        the local settings is a combination of MAC address and hostname:
        for example: 44-87-FC-A9-B4-B2|TEST-PC
        if the system is not yet in the DB it is created, it is retrieved otherwise
        Returns:
        UUID of local system from DB
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
